name: Nahumekh
text: [REACTION]: After the combat phase begins, a target army unit at this planet gets -X HP until the end of the phase. X is the number of non-[NECRON] factions among units you control.
flavor: “All life will tear itself apart by my command.”

name: Destroyer Cultist
text: This unit gets +1 ATK for each non-[NECRON] faction among units you control.
flavor: Utterly under Nahumekh's control, these Destroyers were forced to help him fulfill his vision of pitting the lesser races against one another.

name: Obedience
text: [REACTION]: After a phase begins, exhaust this support to move a non-[NECRON] unit you control to a target planet.
flavor: “My only demand is that you fight and die” -Nahumekh

name: Hate
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Destroy a target army unit with a faction symbol that matches your enslaved faction. X is that unit's printed cost.

name: The Staff of Command
text:
Attach to your warlord.
[ACTION]: Exhaust this attachment to set your enslavement dial to another faction.

name: Anrakyr the Traveller
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Deploy the topmost unit card in a target discard pile. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: “Our people are awakening, and soon all of the galaxy shall be ours once more.”

name: Pyrrhian Eternals
text: For each card named Pyrrhian Eternals in your discard pile, this unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.

name: Slumbering Tomb
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to draw 2 cards. Then, discard 2 cards from your hand.
flavor: Each Tomb World he awakens allows Anrakyr to bolster his forces, furthering his goal of uniting the dynasties once more.

name: Awake the Sleepers
text: [ACTION]: Shuffle any number of [NECRON] cards from your discard pile into your deck.
flavor: “Cast off the shackles of your slumber! This galaxy shall be ours once again!” -Anrakyr the Traveller

name: Pyrrhian Warscythe
text:
Attach to your warlord.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK.
[REACTION]: After attached unit is declared as an attacker, discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

name: Canoptek Scarab Swarm
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit is destroyed, return a target [NECRON] unit from you discard pile to your hand.

name: Warriors of Gidrim
text: This unit gains 1 command icon while you have 2 or more non-[NECRON] factions among units you control.

name: Flayed Ones Pack
text: [FORCED REACTION]: After this unit is declared as an attacker, discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavor: Tainted by the Flayer Virus, these Necrons are consumed by insanity and have a hunger for flesh that can never be sated.

name: Immortal Vanguard
text: Each non-[NECRON] Warrior unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.
flavor: The crimson armor of the Novokh dynasty is a bloody legacy of past victories over the unworthy.

name: Patrolling Wraith
text: [REACTION]: After this unit destroys an enemy unit by an attack, your opponent must reveal his hand and discard each revealed card with the same name as the destroyed unit.

name: Decaying Warrior Squad
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Deploy this card from your discard pile at a planet.
flavor: Dismemberment is but a temporary setback for the Necrons.

name: Deathmark Assassins
text: [REACTION]: After the combat phase begins, discard the top card of your deck. This unit gets +X ATK until the end of the phase. X is the printed cost of the discarded card.

name: Mandragoran Immortals
text: [ACTION]: Sacrifice a non-[NECRON] Soldier unit at this planet to ready this unit. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Tomb Blade Squadron
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy a non-[NECRON] Scout unit, move this unit to a planet. Then, a target non-warlord unit at this planet gets -1 HP until the end of the phase.

name: Reanimating Warriors
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit would be destroyed by taking damage, remove all damage from it and move this unit to an adjacent planet instead. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Canoptek Spyder
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: During a battle at this planet, discard a unit card from your hand to remove 2 damage from a [NECRON] army unit you control at this planet. (Limit once per combat round.)

name: Immortal Legion
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this unit to move it to a planet with an enemy warlord with a faction symbol that matches your enslaved faction.

name: Praetorian Ancient
text: While you have 6 or more units in your discard pile, this unit gets +2 ATK and gains Armorbane.
flavor: The law keepers of Necrons society, Praetorians are charged with ensuring the survival of the ancient dynasties

name: Harbinger of Eternity
text:
You may play each [NECRON] event card from your discard pile as if it were in your hand.
[FORCED REACTION]: After you play a [NECRON] event card from your discard pile, remove that card from the game.

name: Lychguard Sentinel
text:
While you have 6 or more units in your discard pile, this unit gets +4 HP.
Your opponent must declare a ready unit named Lychguard Sentinel as defender, if able.

name: Doom Scythe Invader
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit, put a non-Elite Vehicle unit into play from your discard pile at this planet.

name: Doomsday Ark
text: X is the number of non-[NECRON] factions among units you control.

name: Dread Monolith
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then, put a non-Vehicle [NECRON] unit discarded by this effect into play at this planet. (Limit once per round.)

name: Reanimation Protocol
text: [ACTION]: Remove up to 2 damage from a [NECRON] unit you control. Max 1 per round.
flavor: The Necrons' sophisticated self-repair mechanisms can fix even the most crippling of injuries in a matter of seconds.

name: Recycle
text: [ACTION]: Discard 2 cards from your hand. Then, draw 3 cards.
flavor: Canoptek Scarabs can convert any sort of matter into energy and back again, allowing them to replicate any of the technological wonders of the Necrons at a moment's notice.

name: Mechanical Enhancement
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Each [NECRON] unit you control at a target planet gets +2 HP until the end of the phase.
flavor: The power and effectiveness of a Tomb World's war engines are determined by the skill and knowledge of its Crypteks.

name: Drudgery
text: [ACTION]: Put a target non-[NECRON] unit with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your discard pile at a planet.

name: Extermination
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Each non-unique non-[NECRON] unit at a target planet gets -3 HP until the end of the phase. You must pass during your next deployment turn.

name: Gauss Flayer
text:
Attach to a [NECRON] army unit.
[COMBAT ACTION]: During a battle at this planet, exhaust attached unit to give a target enemy army unit at this planet -2 HP until the end of the phase.

name: Royal Phylactery
text:
Attach to a [NECRON] army unit.
[REACTION]: After a phase begins or a combat round at this planet begins, remove 1 damage from attached unit.

name: Hyperphase Sword
text:
Attach to a [NECRON] army unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK and gains Armorbane.
[ACTION]: Discard a card from your hand to attach this card to another eligible unit at this planet.

name: Resurrection Orb
text:
Attach to an Elite [NECRON] unit you control.
[REACTION]: After a combat round at this planet begins, if the topmost card of your discard pile is a non-Elite [NECRON] unit, put it into play at this planet.

name: Mind Shackle Scarab
text:
Attach to a non-Elite army unit.
[ACTION]: If attached unit's faction symbol matches your enslaved faction, exhaust this attachment to gain control of attached unit until the end of the phase.

name: Timeworn Stasis-Crypt
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy a [NECRON] card, exhaust this support to reduce the card's cost by 1.

name: Weight of the Aeons
text: [REACTION]: After a phase begins, exhaust this support to have each player discard the top 2 cards of his deck.
flavor: Many of the once proud tomb complexes of the Necrons lie in ruins, worn by the ages and entropy.

name: Eternity Gate
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to choose a card in a target player's discard pile and place it on top of that discard pile.

name: Sautekh Complex
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy a unit from a non-[NECRON] faction, if you control no other units from that faction, gain 1 [RESOURCE] or draw 1 card.

name: Master Program
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support and sacrifice a Drone card to remove all damage from target [NECRON] army unit you control and ready it.

name: Particle Whip
text: [HEADQUARTERS ACTION]: Exhaust this support and shuffle any number of unit cards from your discard pile into your deck to deal X damage to a target non-Elite army unit. X is the number of cards shuffled into your deck.

name: Freebooter Kaptain
text: Army units with printed cost 2 or lower do not count their command icons during command struggles at this planet.

name: Backlash
text: [INTERRUPT]: When your opponent triggers an ability that targets an Elite unit you control, cancel its effects. Then, if that ability was triggered from an army unit, destroy it.

name: Defense Battery
text:
Attach to a planet.
[ACTION]: After an enemy army unit moves to or from attached planet, exhaust this attachment to deal 2 damage to that unit.

name: STC Fragment
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy an Elite unit, exhaust this support to reduce the cost of that unit by 2.

name: Ravenwing Escort
text:
While you control a non-[SPACE MARINE] warlord, this unit gains Mobile.
[COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this unit to move an army unit you control at this planet to another planet.

name: Standard Bearer
text:
While you control a non-[ASTRA MILITARUM] warlord, you may deploy this unit from your hand as if it had Ambush.
[REACTION]: After this unit enters play, ready an army unit you control at this planet.

name: Goff Brawlers
text:
While you control a non-[ORK] warlord, this unit gains 1 command icon.
[REACTION]: After this unit readies, each player deals 1 indirect damage among units he controls at this planet.

name: Venomous Fiend
text:
WHile you control a non-[CHAOS] warlord, this unit gains Mobile.
[REACTION]: After this unit moves to a planet, deal X damage to a target enemy army unit at that planet. X is the number of command icons the target unit has.

name: Treacherous Lhamaean
text:
While you control a non-[DARK ELDAR] warlord, this unit gains Armorbane.
[FORCED INTERRUPT]: When this unit is destroyed, sacrifice another army unit at this planet.

name: Nightshade Interceptor
text: While you control a non-[ELDAR] warlord, this unit gains Area Effect (2).

name: Air Caste Courier
text:
While you control a non-[TAU] warlord, this unit gains Flying.
[COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this unit to move an attachment from a unit you control at this planet to another eligible unit you control.

name: Swarmling Termagants
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit is destroyed, put X Termagant tokens into play at this planet. X is the number of factions among enemy units at this planet.
